html:
5.20.17  7:24 am   did you know exactly what you were gonna work on after hotewig?

     yes
5.20.17  7:12 am   how do you remember if you've answered a question similar to the one asked, for you to link the question to the page with other similar questions

5.20.17  7:11 am   isn't it faster to just answer a question rather than link to the page with other similar questions?

     yes that would be faster, but i would get less points, and become weaker

5.20.17  7:01 am   best social media(s) for developing creativity?

     social media(s) are best for Sharing your creativity. you can also develop it on there too, but don't forget to see what you can develop Off social media. maybe even make an entirely new one

5.20.17  5:03 am   Will you skip this question?

     i'll see what i can do
5.20.17  5:03 am   chicken or egg

5.20.17  4:41 am   why do you do things?

     to see what it's like

5.20.17  3:59 am   Do u regret making HoJ and hotewig?

     no

     If so,why?
5.20.17  3:36 am   What Else do you do so in youre Freetime?

5.20.17  3:24 am   how long does it take for you to make one of your "normal" videos?

     which ones are the normal ones

5.20.17  3:09 am   is your creative content in the public domain?

     no

     if no, what kind of copyright do you have for your stuff if you thought about that

     © Bill Wurtz, All Rights Reserved.

5.20.17  2:15 am   what are some good things made of wood

     trees

5.20.17  2:11 am   how do i know if i truly love somebody

     you just have to guess

5.20.17  1:54 am   is the earth flat

     it depends how you look at it

5.20.17  1:41 am   do u know what pms feels like?

     no
5.20.17  1:36 am   Why is questions spelled incorrectly on top?

5.20.17  1:25 am   is it okay to sleep in a closet if it makes one feel secure?

     sure

5.20.17  12:52 am   have you figured out what people mean when they ask "_____ or ______?" yet? if not, i wish you the best of luck

     i think they usually are asking me which one i would prefer, in some situation which they have not mentioned, i guess??

5.20.17  12:20 am   Is twenty four actually a number?

     yes

5.19.17  11:56 pm   When you create a pair of videos that go together, such as "Longer Videos/Stronger Videos" or "Cool Sports/Cruel Sports", do you conceive of both at the same time, or do you conceive of one, create it, and then decide to do a followup?

     longer/stronger were written within seconds of each other. i don't remember about cool/cruel sports. but they were likely written very close together

5.19.17  11:51 pm   Are you going to hang your 1 million YouTube subscribers Golden Play Button anywhere?

     i don't have it
5.19.17  11:05 pm   How soon is now?

5.19.17  10:59 pm   How did you keep/show your religious/ideological biases out of your work in HOTEWIG? And when you scripted it, did you write it with them in mind?

     i kept them in! my bias is that the world we live in is pretty cool

5.19.17  10:53 pm   do you have anyone you can talk to about the creative process besides yourself?

     no

      it is very helpful for me to discuss these kinds of things at length with somebody who thinks on the same wavelength as me, but has their own point of view

     that sounds wonderful

5.19.17  10:39 pm   Do you plan on releasing an album of your greatest hits?

     how about making new stuff instead

5.19.17  10:07 pm   What should you do today?

     keep working on the stuff

5.19.17  9:53 pm   do u get hype about stuff

     oh hell yeah

5.19.17  9:41 pm   Get well soon friend

     i already am well

5.19.17  9:38 pm   why are the hyperlinks green? green is not a creative colour

     i thought it was a reasonably good fit with the other colors on this page

5.19.17  8:47 pm   holy moly how are you awake all day and night.

     i am not

      do you ever sleep

5.19.17  8:44 pm   Do you have any regrets over your online presence and output?

     yes, i regret that i can't do everything at once, 100 times as fast

5.19.17  8:31 pm   if you waste time, and waste more time, how much time have you wasted?

     it depends how much time you wasted each time

5.19.17  8:27 pm   If your entire backlog of unrecorded songs suddenly got finished today, would you be more open to commissions?

     no, i would be writing more songs, doing covers, making more videos, and much more!

5.19.17  8:23 pm   What's your obsession with dolphins?

     i do not have an obsession with dolphins. sorry for the confusion
5.19.17  8:05 pm   Have you done/do you want to do collabs with other internet musicians?

5.19.17  8:02 pm   You seem to be allergic to capital letter.

     i am not, but i respect your opinion

     Why are you allergic to capital letters?

5.19.17  7:56 pm   what was the weirdest thing you saw?

     planet earth

5.19.17  7:49 pm   why am i here

     where

5.19.17  7:41 pm   Would you like to see my definitive proof that Mark Twain is Shania Twain's father?

     if you are talking about the famous writer, and the famous singer, he is not her father. neither of them were actually named twain, and their lifetimes are many years apart
5.19.17  7:35 pm   why do you make videos
5.19.17  7:26 pm   is a question really a question if there's no question mark
5.19.17  7:06 pm   Do you ever get annoyed answering all these pointless questions?

5.19.17  6:56 pm   what is the color of night?

     all the colors, but just a much darker shade
5.19.17  6:13 pm   Why do you hate yourself?

5.19.17  5:42 pm   Hi! How can I sell my song for artist?

     i'm not sure, but if you perform you own songs, you will land the deal every time

5.19.17  5:24 pm   what if the moon is just a spacecraft?

     then it should probably go somewhere
5.19.17  5:06 pm   how to get more friends

5.19.17  4:31 pm   back in 2015 when you tried to balance vines and the making of the japan video, you seemed to think that leaving vines aside for a bit was a bad but necessary thing to do. still, the japan thing blew up and you gained a lot of popularity and new things from that. in my life, i am having some major changes pretty soon. i don't feel very good about them, but i am still kind of interested in what'll happen. idk where this question is even going, but... how do you approach new, possibly bad things that may happen? when does one know it's not good to continue on a thing anymore?

     you have to just make your best guess. and regardless of how it turns out, you will probaby able to guess again next time

5.19.17  4:11 pm   Why have the chords got so complicated names? Or is it really an invalid fear caused by a lack of any proper experience?

     actually most names for chords are not complicated enough to say exacltly which notes are being played, and in which octave. but in most songs you can sort of approximate what's going on with a letter or two, and maybe a symbol and a number

5.19.17  4:09 pm   im nervous for an audtion?

     ah, you should do more auditions. to get less nervous, and also surely win some of them
